info.sourceTextContent: Tal vez para cohonestar esta falta me presentaba yo un sinnúmero de dificultades y objeciones, por cuyo medio trataba de condenar el pensamiento del editor, a fin de justificar mi tardanza en contribuir a su realización con mi trabajo.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Perhaps to palliate this lack me I had a number of difficulties and objections, which was half thinking of condemning the editor, to help justify my tardiness in to fruition with my work.
